subject: Fishing, Sport
Bass (Fish)
lead_paragraph: Kevin VanDam of Kalamazoo, Mich., won $500,000 for his third Bassmaster Classic title, beating Jeff Kriet by five pounds at Lay Lake in Birmingham, Ala.
snippet: Kevin VanDam of Kalamazoo, Mich., won $500,000 for his third Bassmaster Classic title, beating Jeff Kriet by five pounds at Lay Lake in Birmingham, Ala.
